column2: when my small portion of pulled pork showed up
column3: lightly dressed in a vinegary sauce that I just wasn't quite a fan off
column4: I was a little saddened. I had some of my girlfriend's chopped brisket and liked it
column5: but was still let down. The mac and cheese arrived in a baby cupcake tin with a cheese sauce that was quite separated and gritty. I then relied on the brisket chili
column6: which should have had a rich barbeque flavor
column7: to be the home run to save the game. However
column8: the dominant flavor was tomato with a tenuous barbeque-ish undertone.
